Module com.oniverse.maze_runner
Package com.oniverse.neon_dystopia.model.levels.block

Class Block

java.lang.Object
com.oniverse.neon_dystopia.model.levels.block.Block
All Implemented Interfaces:
PropertyChangeListener, EventListener
Direct Known Subclasses:
AmbientLight, Door, End, Floor, Key, Lever, Life, LightBeams, LightReceptor, Mirror, Spike, Stairs, Start, Transporter, TrappedSlab, Void, Wall
public class Block extends Object implements PropertyChangeListener
This class is used to define a block.
